name: Pitcairn
activity_description: Pitcairn acquires Baltimore-based advisory firm Brightside Partners and establishes a new RIA.
full_text: The Pennsylvania-based family office announced it has acquired Baltimore-based advisory firm Brightside Partners alongside which it's established a new RIA.
strategy_insights: Pitcairn is expanding into Registered Investment Advisory (RIA) space, suggesting a strategic shift towards more direct client engagement.

name: Ariel Investments
activity_description: Ariel Alternatives acquires a majority stake in My Code, a multicultural media and marketing services company.
full_text: Ariel Alternatives bought just under a 60% stake in My Code from private-equity firm Falfurrias Capital Partners and other investors.
strategy_insights: Ariel Investments is focusing on acquiring stakes in diverse media and communication sectors, targeting minority-owned entities.

name: Ariel Investments
activity_description: Ariel Alternatives announces the acquisition of a leading communications provider for people who are Deaf and hard-of-hearing.
full_text: In April 2022, Project Black acquired Sorenson, the leading U.S. communications provider for people who are Deaf and hard-of-hearing.
strategy_insights: Ariel Investments is focusing on acquiring stakes in diverse media and communication sectors, targeting minority-owned entities.
